abstract: Practices are outlined for the design, installation, checkout, calibration, and operation of a thrust measurement system to be used during tests of a liquid monopropellant rocket engine. Appendixes include: (1) thrust measurement system elemental uncertainties; (2) short- and long-term thrust measurement system uncertainty; and (3) shunt calibration of force transducers.
title: Force and impulse measurement

publications.publicationName: Handbook of Recommended Practices for the Determination of Liquid Monopropellant Rocket Engine Performance

related.title: Handbook of recommended practices for the determination of liquid monopropellant rocket engine performance
